
layer tree before image style change

{
  "layers": [
    {
      "name": "LayoutView #document",
      "bounds": [800, 600],
      "contentsOpaque": true,
      "backgroundColor": "#FFFFFF"
    },
    {
      "name": "LayoutImage IMG class='composited'",
      "position": [8, 8],
      "bounds": [256, 256],
      "drawsContent": false
    }
  ]
}

layer tree after image style change

{
  "layers": [
    {
      "name": "LayoutView #document",
      "bounds": [800, 600],
      "contentsOpaque": true,
      "backgroundColor": "#FFFFFF"
    },
    {
      "name": "LayoutImage IMG class='composited border'",
      "position": [8, 8],
      "bounds": [260, 260]
    }
  ]
}
